name: Barchetta di patate
desc: A baked appetizer. The potato was washed clean and then baked together with cheese and Rukkhashava Mushrooms. The dish guarantees an unmatched experience when eaten hot. This explains its popularity on the streets of Sumeru. Still, be careful not to burn your tongue.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

customize.name: Ricetta: barchetta di patate
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Potato Boat.

customize.name: Patata
customize.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

customize.name: Funghi di Rukkhashava
customize.desc: Un tipo di fungo che cresce sviluppando strati uno sopra l'altro, come a formare un mare di nuvole, e che cresce principalmente sugli alberi nel profondo della foresta pluviale.

customize.name: Formaggio
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Barchetta di patate deliziosa
customize.desc: A baked appetizer. The oozing cheese flows forth like a golden river, carrying an alluring aroma into your mouth. Soon, you will be amazed by the freshness of the Rukkhashava Mushrooms and the softness of the potato. You can't help but wish that this leisurely and savory tour might last a little longer…

customize.name: Barchetta di patate sospetta
customize.desc: A baked appetizer. The undercooked potato even has dirt on it… A failed attempt at cooking, it seems, and even the cheese that usually goes well with any other ingredients will not be able to save the day.
